name: Winter Wyvern
title: Auroth
lore: A wise dragon of the frozen wastes, Auroth uses ice magic to protect allies and confuse enemies.

arcticBurn.name: Arctic Burn
arcticBurn.description: Wyvern takes to the air, gaining attack range and burning enemies.

splinterBlast.name: Splinter Blast
splinterBlast.description: Fires a projectile that splinters on impact, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.

coldEmbrace.name: Cold Embrace
coldEmbrace.description: Encases an ally in ice, making them immune to physical damage but frozen in place.

wintersCurse.name: Winter's Curse
wintersCurse.description: Freezes an enemy and forces nearby allies to attack them.
